column4: woohoo, i've just been given permission to wipe my laptop of windows and install linux, so what do we reckon? SLED10? Ubuntu? Kubuntu?  hmmm not sure
jack_sparrow: its currently multi booting xp and ubuntu, i'm jsut not sure what linux to install for my GF who is used to windoze!
ubuntu is a good start into gnu/linux
a strong yes from my part.
